org.apache.spark.ml.tuning

Interface ValidatorParams

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HasSeed, Identifiable, Params, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CrossValidatorParams, TrainValidationSplitParams
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CrossValidator, CrossValidatorModel, TrainValidationSplit, TrainValidationSplitModel

    public interface ValidatorParams
extends HasSeed, Params
    Common params for TrainValidationSplitParams and CrossValidatorParams.
